html:div.html:h5: Under DSM (Demand Side Management) , Tata Power has initiated several programs to promote energy efficiency at consumer premises and the programs are approved by MERC (Maharashtra Electricity Regulatory Commission). The program objective is to reduce electricity consumption and enhance energy efficiency. The program is launched by Tata Power in tie up with CROMA (Infiniti Retail Ltd) and Godrej (Godrej and Boyce Manufacturing Company Ltd). Currently, the program is offered to Residential Consumers of Tata Power in Mumbai License Area. Under this program the eligible consumer gets an opportunity to replace their inefficient old refrigerator with new energy efficient refrigerator, which is expected to reduce power consumption thereby reducing their electricity bill in long run. New purchase without exchange option is also made available. Tata Power has negotiated a bulk discount with the Manufacturer and Tata Power is also contributing subsidy amount to offer the energy efficient products to consumers at a large discount.

Panel.headerText: Which type of models are selected under the programme ?

html:div.html:h5: Direct Cool (single door) and Frost Free (double door) models upto 300 liter capacity having latest BEE 5 star rating are selected under this program.

Panel.headerText: Which are the Models available and what are the costs?

html:div.html:h5: The available models and price can be seen under tab "Models Available". The Models and prices may change without prior notice.
TUnder this programme, the models available are upto 300 Liter capacity.

Panel.headerText: How many Refrigerator I can get under this programme?

html:div.html:h5: Each eligible consumer can purchnase ONE refrigerator under this programme.

Panel.headerText: What will you do with the old refrigerator?

html:div.html:h5: The old refrigerator collected from consumer would be scrapped in an environmental friendly manner.

Panel.headerText: What would be Warranty of this Refrigerator?

html:div.html:h5: Standard ONE year refrigerator Warranty and 5 years compressor warranty is offered by the manufacturers.Some models are having 10 years compressor warranty. Additional refrigerator warranty of 1 year is offered at extra cost.

Panel.headerText: What shall I do in case of defect in the Refrigerator?

html:div.html:h5: Consumer can register the complaint to manufacturer as per Warranty card issued to consumer.

Panel.headerText: How do I participate in the programme?

html:div.html:h5: Registration Web-site:- For registration please click on the "Register Here" tab, read and accept the terms and conditions and submit the details. A unique registration number will be displayed after the successful registration.

Order processing Program partner will contact the consumer on registered contact number. He will provide necessary information regarding available products and confirm the order. He will also advice about the payment methodology. The new refrigerator will be delivered only at the residential address mentioned on the consumer's electricity bill. In case of exchange, the old refrigerator will also be picked up only from the residential address mentioned on the consumer's electricity bill.

Panel.headerText: What are the documents which will be required at the time of installation?

html:div.html:h5: Consumer will be required to provide copy of latest Tata Power Electricity Bill and Programme registration number.

Panel.headerText: What is the role of Tata Power?

html:div.html:h5: Tata Power has rolled out the programme and offered special rebate to help the consumers to replace their inefficient appliance by new energy efficient appliance. Tata Power is only a facilitator of this Programme and its role & liability is restricted only to offering a rebate to the manufacturer. The Warranty for the product is provided by manufacturer and any future issue regarding product, installation and Warranty etc. shall be directly dealt with manufacturer without involving Tata Power. Tata Power shall not be responsible in any manner (financial or otherwise) for any issues relating to this Programme or the product in future. Tata Power's decision in all respects for issues/ disputes/differences shall be final.
